title: League client down
body: So my league clent has been down for the past 2 or 3 days now ever since the beta update went live. My client keeps failing to update and I have submitted a ticket to riot but haven't gotten an ounce of help in 2 days. Can someone please help me?

replies.body: Can you elaborate by what you mean when you say failing to update?  Are there any error messages, and what does it say?  At what percent exactly is this happening?  I do see that you already have a ticket and a Specialist has been looking into this with you.  If possible, I recommend grabbing all of the logs that he requested, especially if this is a result of a network problem.  He will reply back as soon as he can!

it happens at various percents as I just keep trying and repairing the client, I have gotten the logs sent to him that he asked for and I don't see this as a network error, however I cant send him a network analysis as the link that's provided has no start button on my screen.

as for the error messages they just read,
'update failed"
'Unspecified error occurred, please check logs for more information'

that's the jist of the error messages
Thanks for the update, this helps a ton!  This unspecified error, what % exactly are you getting it?
Happens at different times, usually between 75% and 99% sometimes as early as 27% to 66%

It can take a while for the patcher to process, so as long as it gets past 27% when I'm not too concerned.  The issue will vary depending on what % you're getting the unspecified error.  Errors below 33% can suggest permissions or security setting issues. 

 If it's at 75% or higher then you are likely having a network problem failing to smoothly download updates.  To prepare, and possibly even get this solved, I recommend going over every step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide.  

You could just be having a combination of problems here.  You can of course wait for your ticket, but I figured I could help in the meantime.
I just got the error report at 12%

This could indeed be a combination of issues then, because at this point the patcher needs to scan your game files but needs permissions.  Go over the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to configure your pc settings and get that access restored.

I have done everything in the connection issues and the permissions guide and still getting error. The only thing i haven't done is reinstall the client, which this has happened before the last time I had reinstalled the client and was getting an error for a week straight
